properties.description:
input: dossier VMC
traitement:
concat all file in vmc,
drop duplicate.
output referentiel VMC.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Material as string,
		{Description article} as string,
		VMC as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'filename') ~> inputVMC
inputVMC derive(year = regexExtract(filename , '(\\d+)',1)) ~> extractYEAr
extractYEAr aggregate(groupBy(Material,
		year),
	VMC = first(VMC)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{SAUNIER DUVAL} as string,
		{208.0} as string,
		{Pièces détachées pour chauffage} as string,
		{05608600} as string,
		{5272.0} as string,
		{33.0} as string,
		{0.0} as string,
		{202008} as string,
		{2020} as string,
		{08} as string
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> output
